com.koalog.util.console
Class BaseConsole

java.lang.Object
  com.koalog.util.console.BaseConsole
All Implemented Interfaces:
Console
Direct Known Subclasses:
StandardConsole
public abstract class BaseConsole
extends java.lang.Object
implements Console

A base console implementation.

This implementation handles the reading of the processes outputs, as well as the dispatching of strings to the processes inputs. It does not provide any implementation of how the console displays the outputs and how the console get the input.

Nested Class Summary
protected  class BaseConsole.OutputReader
          A class that drains a process output and appends it to the parent console.

getOutputReader

protected java.lang.Thread getOutputReader(java.io.InputStream out)
Get a thread to redirect an output stream. Overriding this method makes it possible to customize the thread naming or to use a faster draining method.

Parameters:
out - The output to redirect.
Returns:
A non started thread.
